description: The Ninja gives up 3 inches and 43lbs in this sanction match. Da Bomb's loss was to the Dragon, where she gained valuable mat experience, and now faces the smaller Ninja. However, I have never seen the Ninja this polished. She is definitely not the same Ninja as last season, she is determined to win the title!
title: The Ninja (Lifetime 14-2) vs Da Bomb (Lifetime 0-1)
